sentences.en: And then you told about my giving the Painkiller to the cat.
sentences.cn: 然后您说起我给猫吃止痛药的事.

sentences.en: B : Well , you should take a painkiller now.
sentences.cn: 哦, 你现在应该吃片止痛片.

sentences.en: Give me a painkiller. I can't endure the pain any longer.
sentences.cn: 给我一片止疼片吧, 我实在无法再忍受疼痛了.

sentences.en: I shall persuade him to take the painkiller.
sentences.cn: 我将说服他把药吃下去.
请给我止痛药好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Or they might choose to have a local pain killer painkiller and remain awake.
sentences.cn: 或者可能选择局部麻醉并保持清醒.

sentences.en: Panadol is a painkiller. Its active ingredient is acetaminophen or paracetamol.
sentences.cn: 必理痛是止痛剂. 它的有效成份是醋氨酚或扑热息痛.

sentences.en: Pfizer division, Pharmacia & Upjohn, agreed to plead guilty to a violation over the painkiller Bextra.
sentences.cn: 辉瑞公司分公司法玛西亚普强公司承认了滥用止痛药伐地考昔的罪名.

sentences.en: Since it is a painkiller, denying it to athletes in training would be unethical.
sentences.cn: 由于它只是一种止痛药, 要运动员在训练受伤时完全不用它是缺乏道德的.

sentences.en: Take this painkiller, it usually acts fast.
sentences.cn: 把止痛药吃了, 这个药见效很快.

sentences.en: The painkiller only provides him a short respite from his pain.
sentences.cn: 止痛药仅仅让他在疼痛中有短暂的疏解.

sentences.en: Well, you should take a painkiller now. I'll try and fix a dentist for you.
sentences.cn: 哦, 你现在应该吃片止痛片. 我试试给你约个牙医.

sentences.en: Yet Gerard received no relief except for ibuprofen, a mild painkiller.
sentences.cn: 然而Gerard使用的镇痛药只有非常温和的布洛芬.

sentences.en: You can pre-empt pain by taking a painkiller at the first warning sign.
sentences.cn: 刚出现征兆时，就服用止痛片来预防疼痛。

trans.tran_en: a medicine which reduces or removes pain
